roleset.name: move suddenly
roleset.note: LUNGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lunge' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Self-motion. (from lunge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: parry! dodge! lunge!
example.text: The three of us stopped breathing for a moment, and then when it kept on coming we lunged for the doorway.
